info.name: AMMS Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete AMMS Backend API Collection organized by user types (Admin, Supplier, BD) with screens ordered by system flow. Supports EN/AR via Lang header.

item.name: üîê Admin
item.description: Complete Admin panel endpoints organized by screen flow

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: Admin login, logout, and session management

request.description:
Login as admin user. Returns authentication token.

**Token Expiration:**
- remember_me = false: Token expires in 1 hour (default)
- remember_me = true: Token expires in 30 days
Get authenticated admin user details with roles and permissions
Logout admin user and revoke current access token
Get all supplier accounts with supplier_admin role for project creation

formdata.description: Optional: Project photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB)

request.description: Create a new project. Admin can optionally assign a supplier at creation time.

formdata.description: Optional: New project photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB). Old photo will be replaced.

request.description: Update project details. Uses POST method with form-data to support photo uploads.
Assign a supplier to the project. The supplier_id must exist. expires_at is optional.

item.name: 8. Activity Log
item.description: View system activity and audit logs

item.name: üì¶ Supplier
item.description: Complete Supplier panel endpoints organized by screen flow

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: Supplier login, logout, and session management

request.description: Login as supplier user. Returns authentication token.
Get all supplier accounts from the same supplier for project creation

formdata.description: Optional: Project photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB)

request.description: Create a new project. The supplier creating the project will be automatically assigned as the project owner.

formdata.description: Optional: New project photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, max 5MB). Old photo will be replaced.

request.description: Update project details. Uses POST method with form-data to support photo uploads.
Assign a supplier user (account) to the project. The user must belong to the same supplier.

item.name: üíº BD (Business Development)
item.description: Complete BD panel endpoints organized by screen flow

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: BD login, logout, and session management

request.description: Login as BD user. Returns authentication token.

item.name: 2. Projects (Read-Only)
item.description: View assigned projects - BD users have read-only access

request.description: BD can only view projects they are assigned to
BD cannot see BD assignments - only project info
